items.name: 301 & 302 Redirects
items.info: Lite users can manage up to three redirects.

items.name: Brand URLs & Short Links
items.info: Use Sprout Redirects along with Craft multi-site to manage a brand URL, vanity URL, or short links for a custom domain.

items.name: Status Actions
items.info: Enable or disable one or more redirects at a time using Redirect Element Actions

items.name: Method Actions
items.info: Convert Redirects from 301s to 302s or vice versa using Redirect Element Actions

items.name: Removal Actions
items.info: Add a group of Redirects to the Excluded Redirects list or delete them using Redirect Element Actions

items.name: Reorder Redirects
items.info: Update the priority of where a Redirect gets processed

items.name: Redirect Statistics
items.info: Track and organize Redirects by hits and last used dates to find the ones that should receive attention first

items.name: 404 Tracking
items.info: Monitor 404s on your website to be sure visitors are finding the pages they are looking for

items.name: 404 Redirect Log
items.info: Capture 404 Requests to review and convert them to proper redirects so users find what they are looking for.

items.name: Redirect Match Strategy
items.info: Fine-tune how Redirects are matched with query strings

items.name: Sensitive Data
items.info: Customize how sensitive data like Remote IP addresses are tracked to comply with regulatory obligations.

items.name: Excluded URL Patterns
items.info: Ignore patterns you don't want to see in your logs.
